item.title: An Ode to R
item.description: Working in Data Science, I often feel like I have to justify using R over Python for most tasks. And while I do use Python for running scripts in production, I am much more comfortable with the R environment. Basically, whenever I can use R for prototyping, testing and teaching, I will! But because personal gut-feeling preference isn’t a very good reason to give to (scientifically minded) people, I’ve thought a lot about the pros and cons of using R.
